section.title: Graceful Stop support
section.para: The RA supports Graceful container stop feature. In Graceful Stop state the RA rejects incoming initial events - it rejects new activities creation.

section.title: Graceful Stop reject support
section.para: When the RA is in Graceful Stopping mode the TC_ABORT is send as a response for every new TC_BEGIN TCAP message. CAP-U-ABORT-REASON: no-reason-given (1) is used as a u-abort-reason parameter value.
